colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(ZHES RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS DANG DZAM BHA LA DKAR DMAR GNYIS DANG RJE BTZUN RIG BYED MA RNAMS LA BRTEN NAS BYIN 'BEBS DANG GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RDO RJE 'CHANG DAM TSIG RDO RJE DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I RGYAL CHEN RNAM SRAS LA BRTEN NAS BYIN 'BEBS DANG GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA TSUL GYI CHO GA GZHUNG BSRANG DE SKABS THOB KYI KHA SKONG CUNG ZAD SBYAR TE, DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG BZHIN DU, YE SHES SBYIN PAS BRIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS @015B GA-YAR CHAGS DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,)
